gitb:actor.gitb:name: Trust Network Participant simulated by the Test Bed
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: The Interoperability Test Bed is assumed to be an actor of the Trust Network thus is a simulated participant.

gitb:actor.gitb:name: Trust Network Anchor
gitb:actor.gitb:desc: Trust Network Anchor which receives and distributes PKI-material within a Trust Network. Also called the Gateway of the key network to manage keys. Also called Trust Network Gateway (TNG).
